

Chapter 397 (Former Provisions)

 

MILITARY AFFAIRS; EMERGENCY SERVICES

te: 397.005, 397.

 

National Guard

010, 397.015, 397.020, 397.025, 397.030, 397.035, 397.040, 397.045, 397.050, 397.055, 397.060, 397.065, 397.070, 397.075, 397.080, 397.085, 397.090, 397.095, 397.100, 397.105, 397.110, 397.115, 397.120, 397.125, 397.130, 397.135, 397.140, 397.145, 397.150, 397.155, 397.160, 397.165, 397.170, 397.175, 397.180, 397.185, 397.190, 397.195, 397.200, 397.205, 397.210, 397.215, 397.220, 397.225, 397.230, 397.235, 397.240, 397.245, 397.250, 397.255, 397.260, 397.265, 397.270, 397.275, 397.280, 397.285, 397.290, 397.295, 397.300 (Amended by 1953 c.160 §3), 397.305, 397.310, 397.315, 397.320, 397.325, 397.340, 397.345, 397.350, 397.355, 397.360, 397.365, 397.370, 397.371 (1953 c.340 §1), 397.372 (1953 c.340 §§2,3,5,6; 1961 c.147 §1), 397.373 (1953 c.340 §4), 397.374 (1953 c.340 §6; 1961 c.147 §2), 397.375, 397.380, 397.383 (1953 c.289 §2; subsection (2) enacted as 1955 c.351 §2), 397.385, 397.390, 397.395, 397.400, 397.405, 397.410, 397.415, 397.420, 397.425, 397.430 (1955 c.350 §2), 397.435 (1955 c.350 §3), 397.440 (1955 c.350 §4), 397.505, 397.510, 397.515, 397.520, 397.525, 397.530, 397.535, 397.540, 397.545, 397.550, 397.555, 397.560, 397.565, 397.570, 397.575, 397.580, 397.585, 397.590, 397.595 (amended by 1955 c.350 §1), 397.600, 397.605, 397.610, 397.615 and 397.990, all relating to the National Guard, repealed by 1961 c.454 §213.
